name: bbosong
description:
Game Description
This game was inspired by the dog I had as a child. I created a game based on memories of playing with my dog, walking with her, and giving her a bath. While making this game, I had a happy time recalling old memories. I want to share these memories with everyone who plays the game.

game theme
The game has a total of 4 stages. Each stage has a different theme. You can experience precious time with your dog in a variety of situations, such as playing, walking, bathing, and snacking.

How to play
This game has simple controls and is played by using the left and right buttons to avoid the dog from obstacles. However, in pursuit of high difficulty, an intermediate save function is not provided. To start the game, just click on the front door with the mouse.

When you clear the game, you can see a special ending. Play the game and feel the precious time with my dog.
